noPages.label: This project does not contain any pages.

toc.label: Table of Contents
toc.description: Table of contents. Use the arrow keys to select a page. Press space to go to that page.
toc.htmlDescription: Use the tab key to select a page. Press space to go to that page.

glossary.label: Glossary
glossary.description: A list of words and their definitions.

kbLanguage.label: Special Characters
kbLanguage.description: A list of buttons which add special characters to text areas

errorProject.label: The project data has not loaded.

errorPage.label: No template is currently available for this page type.

errorBrowser.label: Your browser does not fully support this page type.

errorQuestions.noA: No answer options have been added

errorFlash.label: You need to install the Flash Player to view this content.

authorSupport.label: Author Support is ON: text shown in red will not appear in live projects.

hiddenPage.label: This page will be hidden in live projects

hiddenSection.label: This section will be hidden in live projects

radioButton.selected: selected. Use the arrow keys to choose from the options

comboBox.name: ComboBox
comboBox.selectedOptions: selected. Use the arrow keys to select

hotSpot.name: HotSpot
hotSpot.toSelect: Hot Spot. Press Space to select.

targetArea.name: Target Area
targetArea.toSelect: Press space to drop the selected item.

errorResults.label: There was an error loading the results

selectTxt.label: Please select from the options below

adviceTxt.label: Need more advice? Visit the Xerte Toolkits accessibility guide.

screenReaderInfo.label: Screen Reader Information
screenReaderInfo.newWindow: This link will open in a new window
screenReaderInfo.thisWindow: This link will open in this window
screenReaderInfo.dialog: This button will open a dialog window

tabNav.description: This page contains a tabbed panel where the selection of a tab changes the information presented. To select a tab: Click Enter twice (Jaws) or click Shift-Enter (NVDA).

accNav.description: This page contains an accordion panel where the selection of a tab changes the information presented. To select a tab click Enter or Space.

buttonNav.description: This page contains a series of buttons where each one reveals some related information.

slideshow.description: This page contains a slideshow where clicking the next and previous buttons changes the information presented.

audioSlideshow.description: This page displays content in synch with an audio files. New content is added to the page as the audio plays.

videoSynch.description: This page displays content in synch with a video. New content is added to the page as the video plays.

list.description: This page contains a series of links where each one reveals some related information.

mcq.description: This page contains a multiple choice question. Use the tab and up/down arrow keys to explore possible answers and click Space to select your answer.

quiz.description: This page contains a series of multiple choice questions. Use the tab and up/down arrow keys to explore possible answers and click Space to select your answer.

info.none: All possible values are excluded or fall outside the min & max range
info.none2: {n} attempts have not returned an accepted value
info.attempts: {n} attempts to calculate a valid value
